resources.string: Welcome to the NHS guidelines app. Here you can see our guidelines for various conditions. This application is an unofficial prototype and as a result it is incomplete. \n\nUse the hamburger icon at the top right, or swipe from left to right to view side menu, which is used to navigate through the app.

This is the help section.
 Use the hamburger icon at the top right, or swipe from left to right to view side menu, which is used to navigate through the app.
